name: Ancient Thievery
description:
Ancient Thievery Story: 

As a lifelong adventurer, Harper Winfred has set their eyes on a mythical ancient item. Hidden inside a castle awaits a treasure worth untold fortunes. An ancient royal crown! The problem is, guardian skeletons protect the crown from would be thieves! Sneaking around and sprinting away from the guards is the only course of action against these ancient sentinels for Harper in pursuit of their goal!

Controls: 

Mouse and Keyboard as well as Controller support!
KnM: WASD to move and mouse to look around. Shift to sprint. Escape to pause.
Controller: Left stick to move and right stick to look around. Left-Stick-Click to sprint. Pause button to pause.

Credits:
